category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_deactivate_update_reference_properties
preference.preference_description: Manages reference properties and shape representation updates for documents that do not match criteria defined by this preference. By default, reference properties and shape representations are updated for all documents. Possible values : NONE = Update reference properties and shape representations for all documents READ_ONLY = Do not update reference properties and shape representations for documents without write access. STATUS = Do not update reference properties and shape representations when the item revisions have a status. STATUS:xxx = Do not update reference properties and shape representations when the item revisions have a specific status. CATALOG_COMP = Do not update reference properties and shape representations for documents referenced in a catalog
